description: The type of coverage stored on the Coordination of Benefits (COB) information in the patient record.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The line number of the associated coordination of benefits coverage type in the patient's record. This forms the foreign key to the PAT_COB_INFO table.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated coordination of benefits coverage type in the patient's record. Together with PAT_ID, this forms the foreign key to the PAT_COB_INFO table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple coordination of benefits coverage types associated with the patient from the PAT_COB_INFO table.

columns.name: COB_INS_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Coordination of benefits insurance coverage types.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Medical Care


Dental Care
